column1: 20:21|It was twenty-one minutes past eight. The town clerk’s office would be open until nine o’clock. The day was Saturday and taxpayers came in to settle their assessments and water rents. There was time
column4: to get a marriage license.|The Fog|William Dudley Pelly

column2: after a knock at the door
column3: a constable said a military police vehicle had just driven into the courtyard
column4: the driver asking for ""Mr."" Murray."|The Ipcress File|Len Deighton
